com.seagate.util

Interface MessageBroker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiQueueMessageBroker, ThreadPoolMessageBroker

    public interface MessageBroker
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Message broker interface (available via RMI)
